mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various dates, only partially legible, all in the year 1996. Unattributed lines from T.S. Eliot's poem, "The Waste Land." [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
She smoothes her hair with automatic hand, | And puts a record on the gramophone. | YOU CAN DO IT |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Poetry
Eliot, T. S. (Thomas Stearns), 1888-1965
Encouragement
Calendar, Gregorian
